intrebare?: Which one of the following is the best explanation of copyright law?
raspuns1: A law that protects authors and publishers
raspuns2: A law that protects an original invention
raspuns3: A law that protects an original expression of someone
raspuns4: A law that protects an original expression that has been reduced to a tangible form
raspuns corect: A law that protects an original invention

intrebare?: Why is it a good idea to get the author's permission to use a creative work, even if you think it may be fair use?
raspuns1: Fair use law is open to interpretation.
raspuns2: Fair use laws change significantly every year.
raspuns3: Fair use laws affect kids more than adults.
raspuns4: Fair use law isn't written down.
raspuns corect: Fair use law is open to interpretation.
